verses.name: Ezekiel 23:41
verses.text: And satest upon a stately bed, and a table prepared before it, whereupon thou hast set mine incense and mine oil.

verses.name: Ezekiel 23:42
verses.text: And a voice of a multitude being at ease was with her: and with the men of the common sort were brought Sabeans from the wilderness, which put bracelets upon their hands, and beautiful crowns upon their heads.

verses.name: Ezekiel 23:43
verses.text: Then said I unto her that was old in adulteries, Will they now commit whoredoms with her, and she with them?
